articles.title: ‘Halloween: The Game’ Stalks Consoles and PC Next September [Trailer] - Bloody Disgusting
articles.description: The countdown is on for IllFonic and Gun Interactive’s Halloween. During the Sony State of Play, the teams announced that the asymmetric stealth horror game will launch on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on September 8, 2026!…

articles.title: Google just asked the Supreme Court to save it from the Epic ruling - The Verge
articles.description: It’s asking for a partial stay ahead of its petition for Supreme Court review.

articles.description: Review: While I don't usually advise upgrading to the flagship iPhone if you have last year's model, there's one particularly hot factor to consider in 2025.

articles.title: Google reveals its Android for PC is coming next year - The Verge
articles.description: One of the biggest stories out of Qualcomm’s Snapdragon Summit in Maui isn’t just about Qualcomm at all — it’s Android for PC and when it’s coming.

articles.title: Qualcomm announces the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 - The Verge
articles.description: The company promises a generational leap forward with an updated Oryon CPU and more personalized AI experiences.

articles.description: The Fluid Pro AI can be used with GoPro action cameras and phones.

articles.title: Qualcomm announces Snapdragon X2 Elite and Extreme for Windows PCs - The Verge
articles.description: Qualcomm’s flagship PC chip now comes in a second generation with two distinct flavors: the Snapdragon X2 Elite and Snapdragon X2 Elite Extreme.

articles.title: Battlefield 6 Boss says she owes it to the community to deliver the "best Battlefield ever" after 2042 failure - Notebookcheck
articles.description: DICE’s Vice President and General Manager, Rebecka Coutaz, sat down with GamesRadar to talk about Battlefield 6 and her goal of making the best Battlefield ever. She joined the studio right after Battlefield 2042’s launch and is one of the key figures behind …

articles.title: Neon, the No. 2 social app on the Apple App Store, pays users to record their phone calls and sells data to AI firms - TechCrunch
articles.description: A new call recording app is gaining traction for offering to pay users for voice data from calls, which is sold to AI companies.

articles.title: YouTube now lets you hide recommendation pop-ups at the end of videos - TechCrunch
articles.description: The decision to let users hide end screens is a welcome addition to the platform, especially since they can end up covering the last bit of a video and make it hard to see what's happening in some cases.

articles.title: Black Ops 7 will get a new Zombies map with every seasonal update - Dexerto
articles.description: Black Ops 7 brings a new playable Zombies map every season, but it’s not necessarily a full-fledged round-based map.
